title: Art world threads: street style at Frieze Art Fair – in pictures
text:
John Gale, 33, masters student On fashion: I got these trousers for £1 at Deptford Market yesterday. Deptford Market is such an inspiration – you have to rummage through everything but it’s really fun! I have an obsession with really chunky shoes like these ones which are from Dansko. I usually buy secondhand but sometimes I save up and buy something really nice. On Frieze: I’ve been to Frieze before and I love it. Sometimes it’s difficult because there’s so much to see, but I think my favourite this year is Dana Mahnke’s work.

Photograph: Anselm Ebulue/The Guardian
description: The culture crowd brings plenty of personality to their clothes, which on the first day of this year’s fair meant £1 trousers from Deptford Market, special edition Issey Miyake and an all-yellow ensemble
